meanings.definition: Consisting of only one type of algae.
meanings.sent1: The unialgal pond was filled with only one kind of algae.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the unialgal sample under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The unialgal algae threw a party for all the other algae in the pond.
meanings.sent4: Her unialgal focus on work made her stand out among her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The unialgal nature of the algae bloom made it easy to identify.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a single type of algae.
meanings.sent1: The unialgal growth in the aquarium needed special care.
meanings.sent2: The unialgal bloom spread rapidly across the lake.
meanings.sent3: The unialgal algae decided to start a band together.
meanings.sent4: Her unialgal dedication to her studies impressed her teachers.
meanings.sent5: The unialgal color of the algae was a vibrant green.
